02064                         //cout<<"inserting value into unmatched:"<<tempval<<endl;
02065                         unmatched.insert(tempval);
02066                     }
02067                 }
02068                 }
02069                 
02070                 //cout << "At end of layering loop." << endl;
02071             }
02072             //cout << "Out of layering loop."<<endl;
02073             // did we finish layering without finding any alternating paths?
02074             // we do not need to calculate unlayered here.
02075             /*
02076             # did we finish layering without finding any alternating paths?
02077             if not unmatched:
02078                 unlayered = {}
02079                 for u in graph:
02080                     for v in graph[u]:
02081                         if v not in preds:
02082                             unlayered[v] = None
02083                 return (matching,list(pred),list(unlayered))
02084             */
02085             //cout << "Unmatched size:" << unmatched.size() << endl;
02086             if(unmatched.size()==0)
02087             {
02088                 //cout << "Size of matching:" << valinlocalmatching.size() << endl;
02089                 
02090                 if(valinlocalmatching.size()==localnumvars)
02091                 {
02092                     return true;
02093                 }
02094                 else
02095                 {
02096                     return false;
02097                 }
02098             }
02099             
02100             /*
02101             for v in unmatched: recurse(v)
02102             */
02103             {
02104             vector<int>& toiterate=unmatched.getlist();
02105             for(int i=0; i<toiterate.size(); ++i)
02106             {
02107                 int tempval=toiterate[i];
02108                 //cout<<"unmatched value:"<<tempval<<endl;
02109                 recurse(tempval);
02110                 //cout <<"Returned from recursion."<<endl;
02111             }
02112             }
02113         }
02114         return false;
02115     }
02116     
02117     
02118     bool recurse(int val)
02119     {
02120         // Again values are val-dom_min in this function.
02121         // Clearly this should be turned into a loop.
02122         //cout << "Entering recurse with value " <<val <<endl;
02123         if(invprevious.in(val))
02124         {
02125             vector<int>& listvars=vprevious[val];  //L
02126             
02127             // Remove the value from vprevious.
02128             invprevious.remove(val);
02129             
02130             for(int i=0; i<listvars.size(); ++i)  //for u in L
02131             {
02132                 int tempvar=listvars[i];
02133                 int pu=uprevious[tempvar];
02134                 if(pu!=-2)   // if u in pred:
02135                 {
02136                     uprevious[tempvar]=-2;
02137                     //cout<<"Variable: "<<tempvar<<endl;
02138                     if(pu==-1 || recurse(pu))
02139                     {
02140                         //cout << "Setting "<< tempvar << " to " << val <<endl;
02141                         
02142                         if(!valinlocalmatching.in(val))  // If we are not replacing a mapping
02143                         {
02144                             valinlocalmatching.insert(val);
02145                         }
02146                         
02147                         valvarmatching[val]=tempvar;
02148                         //varvalmatching[tempvar]=val+dom_min;  // This will be 
02149                         return true;
02150                     }
02151                 }
02152             }
02153         }
02154         return false;
02155     }
02156     
02157     // BFS alternative to hopcroft. --------------------------------------------
02158     
02159     inline bool bfs_wrapper(int sccstart, int sccend)
02160     {
02161         // Call hopcroft for the whole matching.
02162         if(!bfsmatching(sccstart, sccend))
02163         {
02164             // The constraint is unsatisfiable (no matching).
02165             P("About to fail. Changed varvalmatching: "<< varvalmatching);
02166             getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
02167             return false;
02168         }
02169         
02170         return true;
02171     }
02172     
02173     deque<int> fifo;
02174     vector<int> prev;
02175     vector<int> matchbac;
02176     // use push_back to push, front() and pop_front() to pop.
02177     
02178     //Also use invprevious to record which values are matched.
02179     // (recording val-dom_min)
02180     
02181     inline bool bfsmatching(int sccstart, int sccend)
02182     {
02183         // construct the set of matched values.
02184         invprevious.clear();
02185         for(int sccindex=sccstart; sccindex<=sccend; sccindex++)
02186         {
02187             int var=SCCs[sccindex];
02188             if(var_array[var].inDomain(varvalmatching[var]))
02189             {
02190                 invprevious.insert(varvalmatching[var]-dom_min);
02191             }
02192         }
02193         
02194         // back up the matching to cover failure
02195         matchbac=varvalmatching;
02196         
02197         // iterate through the SCC looking for broken matches
02198         for(int sccindex=sccstart; sccindex<=sccend; sccindex++)
02199         {
02200             int startvar=SCCs[sccindex];
02201             if(!var_array[startvar].inDomain(varvalmatching[startvar]))
02202             {
02203                 P("Searching for augmenting path for var: " << startvar);
02204                 // Matching edge lost; BFS search for augmenting path to fix it.
02205                 fifo.clear();  // this should be constant time but probably is not.
02206                 fifo.push_back(startvar);
02207                 visited.clear();
02208                 visited.insert(startvar);
02209                 bool finished=false;
02210                 while(!fifo.empty() && !finished)
02211                 {
02212                     // pop a vertex and expand it.
02213                     int curnode=fifo.front();
02214                     fifo.pop_front();
02215                     P("Popped vertex " << (curnode<numvars? "(var)":"(val)") << (curnode<numvars? curnode : curnode+dom_min-numvars ));
02216                     if(curnode<numvars)
02217                     { // it's a variable
02218                         // put all corresponding values in the fifo. 
02219                         // Need to check if we are completing an even alternating path.
02220                         #ifndef INCGRAPH
02221                         for(int val=var_array[curnode].getMin(); val<=var_array[curnode].getMax(); val++)
02222                         {
02223                         #else
02224                         for(int vali=0; vali<adjlistlength[curnode]; vali++)
02225                         {
02226                             int val=adjlist[curnode][vali];
02227                         #endif
02228                             if(val!=varvalmatching[curnode]
02229                             #ifndef INCGRAPH
02230                                 && var_array[curnode].inDomain(val)
02231                             #endif
02232                                 )
02233                             {
02234                                 if(!invprevious.in(val-dom_min))
02235                                 {
02236                                     // This vertex completes an even alternating path. 
02237                                     // Unwind and apply the path here
02238                                     P("Found augmenting path:");
02239                                     int unwindvar=curnode;
02240                                     int unwindval=val;
02241                                     P("unwindvar: "<< unwindvar<<"unwindval: "<< unwindval );
02242                                     while(true)
02243                                     {
02244                                         //invprevious.remove(varvalmatching[unwindvar]-dom_min);
02245                                         D_ASSERT(var_array[unwindvar].inDomain(unwindval));
02246                                         D_ASSERT(varvalmatching[unwindvar]!=unwindval);
02247                                         
02248                                         varvalmatching[unwindvar]=unwindval;
02249                                         P("Setting var "<< unwindvar << " to "<< unwindval);
02250                                         
02251                                         if(unwindvar==startvar)
02252                                         {
02253                                             break;
02254                                         }
02255                                         
02256                                         unwindval=prev[unwindvar];
02257                                         unwindvar=prev[unwindval-dom_min+numvars];
02258                                     }
02259                                     
02260                                     #ifdef PLONG
02261                                     cout << "varvalmatching:";
02262                                     for(int sccindex=sccstart; sccindex<=sccend; sccindex++)
02263                                     {
02264                                         if(var_array[SCCs[sccindex]].inDomain(varvalmatching[SCCs[sccindex]]))
02265                                             cout << SCCs[sccindex] << "->" << varvalmatching[SCCs[sccindex]] << ", ";
02266                                     }
02267                                     cout << endl;
02268                                     #endif
02269                                     
02270                                     invprevious.clear();  // THIS SHOULD BE CHANGED -- RECOMPUTING THIS EVERY TIME IS STUPID.
02271                                     for(int sccindex=sccstart; sccindex<=sccend; sccindex++)
02272                                     {
02273                                         int var=SCCs[sccindex];
02274                                         if(var_array[var].inDomain(varvalmatching[var]))
02275                                         {
02276                                             invprevious.insert(varvalmatching[var]-dom_min);
02277                                         }
02278                                     }
02279                                     
02280                                     finished=true;
02281                                     break;  // get out of for loop
02282                                 }
02283                                 else
02284                                 {
02285                                     if(!visited.in(val-dom_min+numvars))
02286                                     {
02287                                         visited.insert(val-dom_min+numvars);
02288                                         prev[val-dom_min+numvars]=curnode;
02289                                         fifo.push_back(val-dom_min+numvars);
02290                                     }
02291                                 }
02292                             }
02293                         } // end for
02294                     }
02295                     else
02296                     { // popped a value from the stack. Follow the edge in the matching.
02297                         D_ASSERT(curnode>=numvars && curnode < numvars+numvals);
02298                         int stackval=curnode+dom_min-numvars;
02299                         int vartoqueue=-1;
02300                         D_DATA(bool found=false);
02301                         #ifndef INCGRAPH
02302                         for(int scci=sccstart; scci<=sccend; scci++)
02303                         {
02304                             vartoqueue=SCCs[scci];
02305                         #else
02306                         for(int vartoqueuei=0; vartoqueuei<adjlistlength[curnode]; vartoqueuei++)
02307                         {
02308                             vartoqueue=adjlist[curnode][vartoqueuei];
02309                         #endif
02310                             if(varvalmatching[vartoqueue]==stackval
02311                                 #ifndef INCGRAPH
02312                                 && var_array[vartoqueue].inDomain(stackval)
02313                                 #endif
02314                                 )
02315                             {
02316                                 D_DATA(found=true);
02317                                 break;
02318                             }
02319                         }
02320                         D_ASSERT(found);  // if this assertion fails, then invprevious must be wrong.
02321                         if(!visited.in(vartoqueue)) // I think it's impossible for this test to be false.
02322                         {
02323                             visited.insert(vartoqueue);
02324                             prev[vartoqueue]=stackval;
02325                             fifo.push_back(vartoqueue);
02326                         }
02327                     }
02328                 }
02329                 if(!finished)
02330                 {   // no augmenting path found
02331                     P("No augmenting path found.");
02332                     // restore the matching to its state before the algo was called.
02333                     varvalmatching=matchbac;
02334                     return false;
02335                 }
02336                 
02337             }
02338         }
02339         return true;
02340     }
